column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Went here for Valentine's Day. What a great experience! The interior is not visible from the street
column3: relaxed vibe inside. Lots of wood
column4: great music (recorded off vinyl - for a retro feel)
column5: the acoustics are great. Place is lively but not over the top. We were seated quickly
column6: ordered drinks and oysters. Two different kinds of delicious oysters and homemade sourdough bread - yum! My steak was perfect - just exactly medium rare. My husband got the pork chop
column7: and it was melt in your mouth. Butternut squash was a well-prepared
column8: a great side. We had a late reservation (10:15) or we would have ordered dessert. Next time for sure! Can't wait.
